entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
